What's the deal with Leaflet?

Our first workshop is going to be all about Leaflet, the popular javascript mapping library.

Never used Leaflet or written javascript before? No problem. Chris Brown will be leading a beginner-friendly intro to building webmaps. Come make some sweet maps with us!

Reminder: maptime is hands-on, so bring a laptop. Weâ€™ll send more specifics out as we get closer to the meetup.
